description:
Bankers Toolbox never sleeps on crime.
We're starting to learn that someone is running a major crime ring in the area.
Help us figure out who it is, how they're pulling it off, and where they're doing it - All with the power of BAM+ Clue!

1.info: Rumor has it Martin has been spending a lot of time at the Casino lately.. He says him and his crew have been winning big!

2.info: Some are dirty, some are nice, better watch out for that faulty card reader - or it'll take your money twice.

3.info: OMG! Did you know there are websites were you can buy designer labels for 75% off?! The only catch is there isn't one of those little "lock" icons in the URL.

4.info: "Come dirty - leave clean" is their motto. Liz says she frequently visits the car wash after a long Sunday drive.

5.info: Will always pays very close attention when John and Michelle talk about the Dark Web.. Almost too close.

6.info: Liz is always jumpy when we talk about rules and regulations.. And she never says a word about her personal life, other than she loves driving with the windows down so she can feel the wind run through her hair.

7.info: Desk mate Christina B. reports Martin receives a lot of calls.. and usually speaks in hushed tones while rushing out of the room.

8.info: This money smells a little funky.. And it was carried into the Casino in a duffle bag.

9.info: Oh man.. Wayne is on vacation and needs a $12,000 wire transfer right now.

10.info: Seems like all of Sara's checks have been rerouted through the wrong treasury lately..

11.info: Hmm.. Martha deposits 3 checks a week.. all just under $10,000.

12.info: Open 24 hours a day, this Nail Salon is always willing to give you a hand!

13.info: Need a social security card? Drugs? Bank accounts? Credit cards? A hit man? We've got it all.

14.info: When that credit card swipe feels soooo smooth, it has to be illegal.

15.info: The only way to buy anything on the Dark Web.

16.info: Seems like this year Sara's kids have a different fundraiser every week.. $7 seems a bit high for a box of Girl Scout Cookies.

17.info: Michelle has a passion for fashion! Specifically she likes talking about her 24-hour nail salon, which reports the highest volume of cash flow at 3 AM...

18.info: Christina uses her innocence to her advantage.. Sara and Will always seem to be waiting on her hand and foot.

19.info: Martha's is the newest addition to the RM team. Her constant chatter about "how to make a quick buck" through mortgage purchasing have us questioning this Southern Belle.

tasks.name: Stop by Professional Services
tasks.desc: Visit the Professional Services table to pick up your secret message

quiz.question: What did one consultant say to the other? (A: "Hi")

tasks.name: Who is your Account Manager?
tasks.desc: Banker's Toolbox started a new position this year, Account Manager. Your Account Manager is there to help you with any and all of your technical difficulties.

tasks.name: Rock and Roll
tasks.desc: Rotel and the Hot Tomatoes will be jamming at the Customer Appreciation Dinner. Take special note of their first song.

quiz.question: What decade was Rotel and the Hot Tomatoes first song from on Wednesday night? (A: 30's)

tasks.name: Beneficial Ownership Ruling
tasks.desc: We have been talking about CDD/Beneficial Ownership a lot during BUG.. Now how can Banker's Toolbox help you prepare?

quiz.question: When is Due Diligence Manager available? (A: February 2020)

tasks.name: Thought Leadership Webinars
tasks.desc: The best way to get your continuing education credits!

quiz.question: Which of these is a webinar Banker's HAS NOT done?

tasks.name: Banker's Toolbox has a new product!
tasks.desc: Recently Banker's Toolbox released Relationship Manager, a software to bring Business Intelligence to Banking.

quiz.question: What functionalities does Relationship Manager have?
answers: Helps predict when a customer will close an account
Helps front line staff know what and when to cross sell to customers

tasks.name: Regional User Group
tasks.desc: Regional User Groups are a great way to stay involved all year! Have you signed up for yours?

quiz.question: What month is the user Conference in? (A: April)
If you get this wrong.. I can't even.

tasks.name: Hotel Mystery
tasks.desc: The Hotel Van Zandt is haunted from conferences past. Oh no!

quiz.question: Who has the best conference ever to be held at Hotel Van Zandt? (A: BTB)

tasks.name: RM Meet & Greet
tasks.desc: Your RM should be your best friend!

quiz.question: What did your RM say when you told them your goal for the year? (A: Cool)
What color is his shirt? (It has palm trees on it)

tasks.name: Loose Lips Sink Ships
tasks.desc: Allison has a secret. and she's telling EVERYONE.

quiz.question: What did Allison Say? (A: Stop asking me what I said)
quiz.answer: Stop asking me what I said

tasks.name: The ACH Challenge
tasks.desc: ACH isn't confusing at all, come learn what its all about!

tasks.name: BKTB Blog
tasks.desc: Blogging is a great way to stay up to date on Banker's Toolbox Happenings. Let's test your knowledge!

quiz.question: How did the blog describe Banker's Toolbox? (A: Sweet)
What is Wayne's favorite TV Show?

tasks.name: Banker's Toolbox is expanding!
tasks.desc: This year, Banker's Toolbox acquired Integra Systems. Test your knowledge about our new product suite.

quiz.question: Which of the following is true about Integra Systems?
answers: Bankers Toolbox acquired the company in February 2017
Their product suite includes IQ AutoScan
IQ AutoScan is an OFAC scanning software
